title: 2bd 2ba, Ceiling fans in dining room, Onsite playground
posting_body: ['South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', '-Wood-style plank flooring', '-Separate dining area', '-Subway tile kitchen backsplash', '-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '-Oversized walk-in closets', '-Onsite playground', '-Polished kitchen countertops', '-Exterior storage available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
